value.name: Police Shoot Man With Long Gun In Lookout Valley After He Raises It Toward Officers; Suspect Jerry Reeves Later Dies
value.description: A man who police said raised a long gun toward them was shot at a house in Lookout Valley on Wednesday morning. The man, Jerry Reeves, 42, died later. At 4:30 a.m., Chattanooga Police officers ...

value.name: What a Life: Not cut out to be an outhouse technician
value.description: I had accepted a job with a friend, Jerry Reeves, who was a subcontractor for a home builder, and I became his crew. We were between projects (we usually built six to 12 homes at a time), and it ...

value.name: Sarah Ann Jimmar
value.description: Reverend Jerry Reeves will officiate. Sarah Jimmar was born May 9, 1948 in Colbert County to the late Emmitt Jimmar, Sr., and Mary L. “Ms.Cenie” Hughes. She was preceded in death by her sister ...
